variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-deprecation
dependencies.description:
The deprecation library provides a deprecated decorator and a
fail_if_not_removed decorator for your tests.

dependencies.name: py-more-itertools
dependencies.description: Additions to the standard Python itertools package.

dependencies.name: py-morphio
dependencies.description: Python library for reading / writing morphology files

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-xmltodict
dependencies.description:
xmltodict is a Python module that makes working with XML feel like you
are working with JSON.

dependencies.name: py-plotly
dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: neuron
dependencies.description:
NEURON is a simulation environment for single and networks of neurons.
NEURON is a simulation environment for modeling individual and networks
of neurons. NEURON models individual neurons via the use of sections
that are automatically subdivided into individual compartments, instead
of requiring the user to manually create compartments.

dependent_to.name: py-bluepyemodel
dependent_to.description: Python library to optimize and evaluate electrical models.
